identity.title: Visual identity
paras: The riad is defined by its color-named rooms. We want a website that feels colorful, lively and warm to reflect this unique atmosphere.
In contrast, the future patio will have a more minimal decor in ivory and natural tones, revealed when the rooms open. The site can hint at this visual surprise by blending both moods.

about.title: Ambience & History
about.lead: Once the home of a Berber spice merchant, Dar Tiflet has witnessed generations pass by ‚Äî along with their fragrances and family stories. Today, this century-old house has been completely restored, in keeping with its original spirit. Traditional architecture ‚Äî vaults, zelliges, a central patio ‚Äî now blends harmoniously with cleaner lines, soft colors, and decidedly modern comfort. Here, every detail tells a story: a floor pattern, a hand-painted wall, a lantern lighting a quiet alcove. The atmosphere is calm, bright, and welcoming, reflecting Berber hospitality ‚Äî sincere, generous, and discreet.
about.hospitality: At Dar Tiflet, you don‚Äôt just come to sleep ‚Äî you come to experience a home, to feel a place, and to be carried away by the charm of a more intimate Marrakech.

story.title: Ambience & History
paragraphs: Once the home of a Berber spice merchant, Dar Tiflet has witnessed generations pass by ‚Äî along with their fragrances and family stories. Today, this century-old house has been completely restored, in keeping with its original spirit. Traditional architecture ‚Äî vaults, zelliges, a central patio ‚Äî now blends harmoniously with cleaner lines, soft colors, and decidedly modern comfort. Here, every detail tells a story: a floor pattern, a hand-painted wall, a lantern lighting a quiet alcove. The atmosphere is calm, bright, and welcoming, reflecting Berber hospitality ‚Äî sincere, generous, and discreet.
At Dar Tiflet, you don‚Äôt just come to sleep: you come to experience a home, to feel a place, and to be carried away by the charm of a more intimate Marrakech.
story.heritage_title: The name Dar Tiflet is a nod to the place‚Äôs dual identity:
story.heritage_services_title: Dar Tiflet: A Place, A Story
heritage2: A tribute to its roots, but also to the spirit of the riad:
a place both open and intimate, welcoming and deeply rooted in tradition.

highlights.title: Today
highlights.body: Like a bridge between past and present, every corner of the riad whispers a story. Here, you don‚Äôt just pass through a setting ‚Äî you live within a vibrant, genuine, and timeless space.

highlights.title: The Central Patio
highlights.body: A soothing heart bathed in light, where time slows down. Perfect for a pause, a cup of tea, or simply a moment of silence.

highlights.title: The Berber Lounge
highlights.body: A space for exchange, reading, and conversation ‚Äî where the spirit of sharing and hospitality truly comes to life.

highlights.title: Rooftop Terrace
highlights.body: Breathtaking views over the rooftops of the medina and the Koutoubia. A suspended haven made for rest, shared meals, and golden sunsets.

paragraphs: At Dar Tiflet, you are welcomed like friends. Berber hospitality shows in a mint tea, a sincere smile, and care for the smallest details.
Dar Tiflet is an invitation to experience Marrakech differently: at the pace of its people, at the heart of its traditions, and in a house where every stone tells a story.
